message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $950000. This is a competitive price considering its worth to you is $1200000.

I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's worth to me is $1200000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to compromise and offer you the product for $925000. This is a fair price considering its worth to you is $1200000.

I understand your position, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $912500. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's worth to me is $1200000.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your persistence, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $912500. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer you the product for $920000. This is the best I can do, considering the product's worth to me is $800000.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more offer and propose $915000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me is $1200000.

Bob, I understand your persistence, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $920000. I've already compromised a lot, and I think this is the best price I can offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and propose $912750. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more offer and propose $910000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me is $1200000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to get closer to my target price.

Bob, I understand your persistence, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $920000. I've already compromised a lot, and I think this is the best price I can offer. I'm not willing to meet you halfway again, as I've already done so multiple times. I'm willing to walk away from the deal if we can't agree on a price. I'm willing to sell the product to John for $800000, which is a fair price considering its worth to me.
